title: cultural_data_Riddle_Mia_This
text:
ï»¿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.artsmia.riddlemiathis.
Application Name: Riddle Mia This.
Number of Reviews: 9.00.
Application Description: Cryptic messages. Hidden clues. Secret societies. This is the Minneapolis Institute of Art as giant puzzle room, a museum mystery you can solve with the Riddle Mia This app. Use the app to search for clues in the artworks and expose a secretive faction of anti-technologists.  You can only play Riddle Mia This while visiting the Minneapolis Institute of Art. Play by yourself or with a team. It takes about an hour to play.
Number of Characters in Description: 423.00.
Overall Rate: 4.60.
First Page Reviews: It was a little confusing to get started, but lots of fun once we got going. I hope there are more options in the future, as it would not be fun to do the same one again. We got to see some different things because of the app. Takes you through the museum in about an hour, giving you puzzles along the way. A great way to experience the museum! Fun and challenging at the right amount. A good way to discover things you don't about the Mia Didn't work, camera wouldn't open.
